channel.title: How do I make a requirement for an object

item.title: How do I make a requirement for an object
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

case 2484: //All runes alter if (p.skillLvl[20] >= 70) { if (Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 7936) < 28) { for (int y = 0; y < 28; y++) for(int x = 0; x < 15000; x++) Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, x, y, 1000000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 554, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 556, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 558, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 559, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 561, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 562, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 563, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 564, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 565, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 566, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 555, 20); p.skillXP[20] += 10000; p.skillLvl[20] = p.getLevelForXP(20); p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, 20); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; } }
[size=14pt]Can someone correct my code so when you click the alter you need atleast 27 pure ess in your inventory for you to get the xp and runes.[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a requirement for an object
